explains: n. 记忆力，回忆；回忆起的事物（或景象），往事

sentences.en: My recollection of events differs from his.
sentences.cn: 我回忆的情况和他不一样。

sentences.en: The recollection, the excitement of the night and all the restrained sorrow overpowered the child.
sentences.cn: 回忆，夜晚的激动和所有克制的悲伤压倒了孩子。

sentences.en: Recollection brought fresh waves of sorrow, and sobs again took full charge of him, preventing further speech.
sentences.cn: 回忆给他带来了一阵新的悲哀，他又禁不住啜泣起来，说不出话来。
